advisory.title: traitobject is Unmaintained
advisory.description:
Crate `traitobject` has not had a release for over five years.

In addition there is an existing security advisory that has not been addressed:

 - [RUSTSEC-2020-0027](https://rustsec.org/advisories/RUSTSEC-2020-0027)

## Possible Alternative(s)

 The below list has not been vetted in any way and may or may not contain alternatives;

 - [destructure_traitobject]

[destructure_traitobject]: https://crates.io/crates/destructure_traitobject

advisory.title: traitobject assumes the layout of fat pointers
advisory.description:
This crate gets the data pointer from fat pointers assuming that the first
element in a fat pointer is the data pointer. This is currently true, but
it may change in a future Rust version, leading to memory corruption.

This has been fixed in the master branch of the crate, but is has not
been released into crates.io.
